Cruise control has you covered in this Nissan.  Stop fumbling around trying to get into your car. Say goodbye to scratched up drivers door handles. This Nissan comes with remote locking. A 2020 Alfa Romeo Giulia  with WOF until 15/07/2025 and registration until 13/12/2024.  This New Zealand new Sports Car has done 24,716 Kms and has had 7 owners.  Don't overheat in the summer. This Giulia is equipped with air conditioning.  Don't worry about losing those pesky hub caps. This Alfa Romeo has alloy wheels fitted.  We've taken this one for that all important safety check for you - this Giulia comes with a fresh WOF.  No need to worry about expensive cambelt jobs as this Alfa Romeo is running a timing chain. Pair your device to this Alfa Romeo using Bluetooth, put some tunes on and sing along. Just make sure the windows are up…  Like to sit back and relax on those long journeys? Cruise control has you covered in this Alfa Romeo.  With a reverse camera on the rear you'll back into parking spots with ease in this Sports Car.  Keep your hands on the wheel at all times. This Alfa Romeo has controls on the steering wheel for your safety, and convenience.  Plug into the USB port in this Giulia, and listen to what you want (too bad if the back seat drivers don't like it).  This vehicle is sold on behalf of a Finance Company.
